item.title: ASP.NET Core and Angular BFF using a YARP downstream API protected using certificate authentication
item.description: This article demonstrates how to implement a downstream API protected by certificate authentication using Microsoft YARP reverse proxy in an ASP.NET Core web application. The application uses Angular for its UI and secures both the UI and the ASP.NET Core backend through a backend-for-frontend security architecture.
